parts.text:
Spack

```json
{
"scheduler": "slurm",
"scheduler_module": "slurm",
"spack_version": "0.17.3",
"spack_instance_name": "gpu",
"spack_instance_dir": "/cm/shared/apps/spack/0.17.3/gpu",
"spack_package": "trilinos@13.0.1",
"spack_compiler": "gcc@10.2.0",
"spack_variants": "+adios2 +amesos +amesos2 +anasazi +aztec ~basker +belos +boost ~chaco ~complex ~cuda ~cuda_rdc ~debug ~dtk +epetra +epetraext ~epetraextbtf ~epetraextexperimental ~epetraextgraphreorderings ~exodus +explicit_template_instantiation ~float +fortran +gtest +hdf5 ~hypre +ifpack +ifpack2 ~intrepid ~intrepid2 ~ipo ~isorropia +kokkos ~mesquite ~minitensor +ml +mpi +muelu ~mumps ~nox ~openmp ~phalanx ~piro +python ~rol ~rythmos +sacado ~scorec ~shards +shared ~shylu ~stk ~stokhos ~stratimikos ~strumpack +suite-sparse ~superlu +superlu-dist ~teko ~tempus +tpetra ~trilinoscouplings ~wrapper ~x11 ~zoltan ~zoltan2",
"spack_dependencies": "^adios2@2.7.1/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' adios2@2.7.1 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} +mpi ^openmpi@4.1.3) ^boost@1.77.0/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' boost@1.77.0 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~mpi) ^hdf5@1.10.7/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' hdf5@1.10.7 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} +mpi ^openmpi@4.1.3) ^parmetis@4.0.3/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' parmetis@4.0.3 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ^openmpi@4.1.3) ^superlu-dist@7.1.1/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' superlu-dist@7.1.1 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~int64 ^openmpi@4.1.3)",
"spack_spec": "trilinos@13.0.1 % gcc@10.2.0 +adios2 +amesos +amesos2 +anasazi +aztec ~basker +belos +boost ~chaco ~complex ~cuda ~cuda_rdc ~debug ~dtk +epetra +epetraext ~epetraextbtf ~epetraextexperimental ~epetraextgraphreorderings ~exodus +explicit_template_instantiation ~float +fortran +gtest +hdf5 ~hypre +ifpack +ifpack2 ~intrepid ~intrepid2 ~ipo ~isorropia +kokkos ~mesquite ~minitensor +ml +mpi +muelu ~mumps ~nox ~openmp ~phalanx ~piro +python ~rol ~rythmos +sacado ~scorec ~shards +shared ~shylu ~stk ~stokhos ~stratimikos ~strumpack +suite-sparse ~superlu +superlu-dist ~teko ~tempus +tpetra ~trilinoscouplings ~wrapper ~x11 ~zoltan ~zoltan2 ^adios2@2.7.1/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' adios2@2.7.1 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} +mpi ^openmpi@4.1.3) ^boost@1.77.0/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' boost@1.77.0 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~mpi) ^hdf5@1.10.7/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' hdf5@1.10.7 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} +mpi ^openmpi@4.1.3) ^parmetis@4.0.3/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' parmetis@4.0.3 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ^openmpi@4.1.3) ^superlu-dist@7.1.1/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' superlu-dist@7.1.1 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~int64 ^openmpi@4.1.3)"
}
```

The script runs a Spack command to install the Trilinos package with a specific version and compiler. The script also defines a number of environment variables to configure Spack, including the scheduler, spack version, instance name, instance directory, package, compiler, variants, and dependencies. The script then uses the `spack spec` and `spack install` commands to concretize and install the package.

The script also configures the Lmod module environment and waits for 20 seconds. This suggests that the script is being used to install and manage Trilinos for use in other applications.

Here are some additional details about the script:

* The script uses the `SBATCH` directives to run on a Slurm cluster.
* The script requires 8 CPUs per task.
* The script has a time limit of 1 hour.
* The script uses the `time` command to measure the time it takes to install Trilinos.
* The script uses the `printenv` command to print the environment variables.
* The script uses the `spack config get` commands to get information about Spack's configuration.
* The script uses the `spack module lmod refresh` command to refresh the Lmod module environment.

The script also includes several comments that provide more context about the commands and the purpose of the script.
